title: WEATHER: 10 families affected & 9 houses damaged by gale winds and floods
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Disaster Management Center said that 10 families have so far been affected by gale winds and floods.
In a situation report on Tuesday (31), the DMC said that 35 people in total were affected and 9 houses were partially damaged.
WEATHER: Wind speeds up to 50 kmph / 100 mm rainfall expected
Cabinet approves Ranil’s proposal to amend Acts to increase state revenue
